title: The ‘sea women’ of South Korea
text:
Cultural Activities The ‘sea women’ of South Korea In an unexpected gender twist, the elderly females on this island uphold one of the country’s most fascinating and enduring traditions. By BBC's The Travel Show 7 July 2015 
In an unexpected gender twist, the elderly females on this island uphold one of the country’s most fascinating and enduring traditions.
